booking.title: Book Your Appointment
booking.description: Complete the steps below to schedule your session

option.title: Select a Service
option.description: Choose the type of session that works best for you

addons.title: Enhance Your Experience
addons.description: Optional add-ons to make the most of your session
addons.no_addons_available: No add-ons available for this service

calendar.title: Select Date & Time
calendar.no_available_times: No available times for this date

review.title: Review Your Booking
review.description: Please confirm all details are correct

duplicate.title: Potential Duplicate Appointment
duplicate.description: We found existing appointments that may conflict with this booking:
duplicate.confirm: I understand and want to proceed anyway

payment.remainingBalanceDescription: The remaining balance of ${remainingBalance} will be due at the time of your appointment.

modification.title: Manage Your Appointment
modification.description: Cancel or reschedule your existing appointment

type.title: What would you like to do?
type.description: Choose to cancel or reschedule your appointment

form.title: Find your appointment
form.description: Enter your details to find your booking

type.label: How would you like to find your appointment?

searchError.notFound: No appointment was found with the provided details. Please check and try again.

notAllowed.cancel: Hi {name}, unfortunately we cannot cancel this appointment at this time. Please contact us to cancel.
notAllowed.reschedule: Hi {name}, unfortunately we cannot reschedule this appointment at this time. Please contact us to reschedule.

calendar.title: Select New Date & Time
calendar.description: Choose a new time for your {serviceName} appointment

cancel.title: Review Cancellation
cancel.description: Please confirm the appointment details below

alert.title: You are about to cancel this appointment
alert.subTitle: This action cannot be undone
alert.forfeitDepositDescription: If you do, your deposit will not be refunded.

cancel.checkboxLabel: I confirm that I understand and want to cancel this appointment

reschedule.title: Review Changes
reschedule.checkboxLabel: I confirm that I understand and want to reschedule this appointment

cancel.title: Cancellation Fee
cancel.description: Please pay the required fee to proceed

reschedule.title: Reschedule Fee
reschedule.description: Please pay the required fee to proceed

cancel.title: Appointment Cancelled
cancel.description: Your appointment has been successfully cancelled.

reschedule.title: Appointment Rescheduled
reschedule.description: Your appointment has been successfully rescheduled.

no_avaialable_time_slots: No available time slots on this day
duration_select_title: How much time do you need?
form_duration_hour_minutes_label_format: Duration: {hours, plural, =0 {{minutes} min} other {# hr, {minutes} min}}
select_timezone_label_format: All times are in <timeZoneCombobox></timeZoneCombobox> time zone
search_timezone_label: Search to change the time zone
confirmation_success_message: Thanks, {name}! Your request for {service} has been received and you will get confirmation shortly.
availability_fetch_failed_description: Something went wrong while we were getting available times. Please contact us
submit_event_failed_description: Something went wrong while we were trying to book your appointment. Please contact us
submit_event_failed_time_not_available_d: Seems like time is not available anymore. Please select another time slot
payment_information_fetch_failed_descrip: Something went wrong while we were trying to get the information to book your appointment. Please contact us
payment_form_deposit_required_descriptio: In order to book this appointment, {percentage}% (${amount}) deposit is required. Please pay by using the form below
payment_form_full_payment_required_descr: In order to book this appointment, full paymant of ${amount} is required. Please pay by using the form below
duplicate_appointment_checkbox_label: I confirm that I understand and want to book this appointment
cancel_appointment_form_title: Let's find your appointment. Please provide the details of the appointment you want to cancel
reschedule_appointment_form_title: Let's find your appointment. Please provide the details of the appointment you want to reschedule
cancel_appointment_confirmation_success_: Thanks, {name}! Your appointment for {service} has been cancelled and you will get confirmation shortly.
reschedule_appointment_confirmation_succ: Thanks, {name}! Your appointment for {service} has been rescheduled to {newDateTime} and you will get confirmation shortly.
cancel_appointment_not_allowed_title: Cancellation is not allowed for this appointment
cancel_appointment_not_allowed_message: Hi {name}, unfortunately we cannot cancel this appointment at this time. Please contact us to cancel.
reschedule_appointment_not_allowed_title: Rescheduling is not allowed for this appointment
reschedule_appointment_not_allowed_messa: Hi {name}, unfortunately we cannot reschedule this appointment at this time. Please contact us to reschedule.
appointment_fetch_failed_description: We can't find your appointment. Make sure you have the correct date & time, and an email or phone number and try again. Or contact us to modify your appointment.
cancel_appointment_confirmation_forfeitD:
Hi {name}, are you sure you want to cancel your appointment for {service} on {dateTime}?

If you do, your deposit will not be refunded.
cancel_appointment_confirmation_partialR:
Hi {name}, are you sure you want to cancel your appointment for {service} on {dateTime}?

If you do, {refundPercentage}% of your deposit{refundFees, plural, =1 {} other {{feesAmount, plural, =0 {} other { (except ${feesAmount} fees)}}}} will be refunded (${refundAmount}).
cancel_appointment_confirmation_fullRefu:
Hi {name}, are you sure you want to cancel your appointment for {service} on {dateTime}?

If you do, your deposit{refundFees, plural, =1 {} other {{feesAmount, plural, =0 {} other { (except ${feesAmount} fees)}}}} will be refunded fully (${refundAmount}).
cancel_payment_partial_required_descript: Hi {name}, are you sure you want to cancel your appointment for {service} on {dateTime}?
cancel_payment_full_price_required_descr: Hi {name}, are you sure you want to cancel your appointment for {service} on {dateTime}?
cancel_appointment_confirmation_checkbox: I confirm that I understand and want to cancel this appointment
reschedule_appointment_confirmation_desc: Hi {name}, are you sure you want to reschedule your appointment for {service} on {dateTime} to {newDateTime}?
reschedule_appointment_confirmation_chec: I confirm that I understand and want to reschedule this appointment
cancel_submit_failed_description: Something went wrong while we were trying to cancel your appointment. Please contact us
reschedule_submit_failed_description: Something went wrong while we were trying to reschedule your appointment. Please contact us
cancel_fee_required_description: In order to cancel this appointment, a fee of {percentage}% (${amount}) from total price of ${totalPrice} is required. Please pay by using the form below
reschedule_fee_required_description: In order to reschedule this appointment, a fee of {percentage}% (${amount}) from total price of ${totalPrice} is required. Please pay by using the form below
